description: This file defines a singleton object StringUtils providing utility functions for string manipulation, specifically join and split operations using linked list representations.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Converts a LinkedList into a String using JoinUtils.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The linked list to join into a string.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a string into a LinkedList using SplitUtils.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The string to split into a linked list.
